data.title: Square One TV/Episode 227
data.text:
This article about an episode needs to be expanded with more information.

Please help out by editing it.

Episode 227 is the twenty-eighth episode of the second season of Square One TV, and the one-hundred second episode overall.

Starring:

Guest Starring: Ben Hoag (Bronco Guillermo Gomez)

Co-Starring:

Contents

1 Segments

2 Notes

3 Trivia

3.1 The Show

3.2 Allusions and References

4 Quotes

Segments

Exclusive Music Video: "Estimation" (Reimy) (EKA #202)

A song about estimation which suggests that estimating is a quick and easy way to get an answer fast. It is quite a useful tool when an answer doesn't need to be exact

Square One Squares: Ken vs. Jessica

2 students try to determine which cast member is giving the correct answer to the questions: Pickle Pies, Silver Dollar, and Tables.

Grempod and Blotmo: Sponge Candy

Grempod, a Rigelian alien, offers his pal Blotmo a ripe sea fig from the planet Xerkne if he can guess which of his 4 hands holds the treat. The probability is 1/4 that Blotmo will choose correctly.

Harry's Hamburger Haven (EKA #107)

As the characters attempt to shoot a commercial for Harry's Hamburger Haven, they note the equivalence of decimal, fraction, and percent.

Dirklet: Number Trick

Dirk demonstrates a number trick: take a 3-digit number, reverse them, subtract smaller from larger; middle digit of the difference will be 9 and the sum of the other 2 is 9.

EB: Spot the Pentagons

This short animation asks the viewer to identify which of the polygons are pentagons.

Mathnet: The Case of the Map with a Gap - Part 2

The Mathnetters join Bronco and ride horses into Mulch Gulch, a deserted ghost town. They are in search of the buried trasure.
